location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Shiraz, to Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges the receipt of a copy of a dispatch, dated 17 September 1813, from the Secretary to the Supreme Government, regarding Seyd Mahomed Akill [Sayyid Muhammad Aqil]. William Bruce promises to act according to the guidance given in the dispatch.
